brim, black mountain graphic on front, and light heather gray body.', }, { name: 'Carry', href: '#', imageSrc: 'https://tailwindui.com/img/ecommerce-images/mega-menu-01-men-category-04.jpg', imageAlt: 'Model putting folded cash into slim card holder olive leather wallet with hand stitching.', }, ], }, ], pages: [ { name: 'Company', href: '#' }, { name: 'Stores', href: '#' }, ], } function
